title: The stupidity of ML in ECE
content: People have to write the codes for ML algorithms in lab book for marksâ€¦ the most stupid thing Iâ€™ve seen!

comments.body: We Mtech students had it in 2nd sem, and the CS guys said it's harder than what we studied in the last 6 years because they didn't build any base. Asking to imagine and algorithm is cursed
Yes been there. That whole course feels forced on to ECE imho.
Yeah Iâ€™ve noticed, though the ECE hod is much better than other HODs, all the profs there are very old schoolâ€¦ not a great way of learning, and they donâ€™t listen even if they complain
My capstone was in computer vision along with reinforcement learning under professor Niranjana BK. Your old school remark applies to her a lot ðŸ˜‚.
What the hell, I had ML in sem 6 and I didn't have any coding
You mean the RR Hod? Coz ajey kinda sucks
Finally someone spoke outside.... One of the dumbest thing to do.... Moreover some profs asked us to note the outputðŸ¤¡
Not a big deal I guess!
